caption:
This photograph captures a large, rectangular, green waterfront house located directly on the edge of a lake or river. The house has a dark green or black roof, and features many white-framed windows along its side. A small, attached section of the home appears to have a green roof, matching the siding of the main structure. A white picket fence runs along one edge of the house, near a wooden dock that projects into the water.

Adjacent to the main house there is a small, green outbuilding, which might be used as a shed or boathouse. Near this building, a small, grey motorboat is tethered to another section of the dock. The immediate surroundings of the house are densely wooded, with tall trees providing a lush green background which suggests a secluded, natural environment.

Overall, the image projects a serene, rustic setting, likely intended for leisure or vacation purposes, given its placement and design optimized for waterfront living.
title: Washington--waunna
